item.title: Introduction to sabermetrics
item.description: Some baseball fans regard sabermetricians as freaks crazy about numbers instead of the real baseball. However, I do not agree with that in two ways. It is not just about a number. "S" in sabermetric means It is simply trial to understand the baseball game.
